dublin_core.dcvalue: During home visits, CHWs use the mobile phone based application to access audio & visual counseling modules for antenatal and postnatal care. The application also serves as a data collection tool, allowing CHWs to upload information about the pregnancy. CHW's can use the mobile tool to link a woman's family with a skilled provider once labor begins.
